data.title: It's a scam
data.text: The only thing good about this Hotel, is the location. We were able to walk everywhere and that was great. We booked online on the website of the hotel. Our arrived at hotel the agent could not find our reservation. We got lucky that they happened to still have rooms available. Back at home we are surprise to see the our credit card was charged twice for this night of Jun 18, 2016, at the 3 Palms Napa Valley Hotel. Our original reservation was set at Total: USD 181.26 (with taxes & fees). However, an additional charge for the same night was added in the amount of $185.20. We tried to contact their office by email (on three different email adress) and phone with no success. So we never received our money back!!!

data.title: A former Travel Lodge rebranded - a real stretch to call it a "resort"!
data.text: I had to laugh when I re read, after arrival, "Boutique Hotel and Resort". Ha!  Its a Travelodge MOTEL-  recently bought and painted - with new furniture and bed, which was actually comfortable.  Don't expect high quality sheets or pillows.  Or charm, unless you count the fake flowers.  No restaurant and a pool that would take 3 laps to swim across if you are short. Or a child. Extremely misleading photos and description.  So as long as you are prepared for this, and get a very good price, it's fine.  It's  definitely centrally located.

owner_response.author: NVHAS, Guest Relations Manager at Napa Valley Hotel & Suites, a 3 Palms Boutique Hotel and Resort, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
While we are glad that you felt our location was convenient for you, we are disappointed that we weren't able to knock it out of the park for you. Thanks for letting us know your feedback. We hope you will give us another try.

Best,
Hotel Management
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Door sticks which was annoying
data.text: There was a wedding party there and they were yelling from the 2nd floor to the parking lot at 3 in the morning. We had a room where there were three doors and we were the middle. It was very loud with people coming and going. The bfast was just okay. The location is great though walking is easy to downtown. Parking is hard but they also have street parking.

owner_response.author: NVHAS, Guest Relations Manager at Napa Valley Hotel & Suites, a 3 Palms Boutique Hotel and Resort, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
We are sorry to hear that your stay was spoiled by noise from other guests at night. We do ask our guests to respect one another and keep the noise level to minimum, we try not to intervene, but if I asked, we would gladly oblige to ensure our guests feel comfortable and get good rest. Thank you for taking time to write to us. We sincerely hope you'll give us another opportunity to show you how wonderful your stay at our hotel can be. We are eager to improve your experience. 

Best,
Hotel Management
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great location & incredible staff
data.text: The town of Napa is the perfect base for a Napa Valley experience. 3 Palms is walking distance to everything in town, including several restaurants and a mini wine route through Napa. The front desk was very helpful with advice, maps and details on wineries that made planning for our short stay so easy. The rooms are very comfortable and there is a pool in the complex for relaxing at the end of a tough day of wine-tasting.

owner_response.author: NVHAS, Guest Relations Manager at Napa Valley Hotel & Suites, a 3 Palms Boutique Hotel and Resort, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We do have a really great location don't we?! We're happy to hear that everything throughout your recent stay went so smoothly, and that you had a great night's sleep. We think that is obviously the most important experience for any guest to have. We do hope that you make a return visit to Napa, and we look forward to welcoming you back when you do!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Everything You Need
data.text: This hotel is not fancy but has everything you need- clean room, friendly staff and great location. We checked in extremely late and were greeted with a smile and lots of helpful information for our stay.

owner_response.author: NVHAS, Guest Relations Manager at Napa Valley Hotel & Suites, a 3 Palms Boutique Hotel and Resort, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
So happy that you enjoyed your stay with us and found our hotel and room perfect for your needs. Thank you for your review. We look forward to welcoming you again soon.

Best,
Hotel Management
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Location in Napa
data.text: We had a room on the 2nd floor.  It had a good shower strong and warm.  The bed was comfortable and the room decorations were nice.  It was much better than we had expected.   The downside was there was not enough parking spaces for the number of rooms.  I had read this on previous reviews and we had friends that rented a home 2 blocks away that had parking.  Otherwise the church a block away in under construction and has a parking lot to use.  The folks were very friendly and helpful.  We spent our days out and enjoying the valley.  Used the room to sleep  and then shower in the morning.  It was just fine.

owner_response.author: NVHAS, Guest Relations Manager at Napa Valley Hotel & Suites, a 3 Palms Boutique Hotel and Resort, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you for staying with us. It's good to hear that your comfortable room, convenient location and our warm service exceeded your expectations. Professional customer service and comfortable rooms with great amenities are always what we strive for and I'm so pleased to hear that we achieved our goal your visit. Thank you for your review, we hope you had a great time in Napa!

Best,
Hotel Management
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great place to stay close to everything!
data.text: We had a great stay,  Gary Dent was an amazing manager.  He helped us plan each day,  told us the best places to eat and taste wine.  He was a breath of fresh air and very helpful!  He really made our visit better.

owner_response.author: NVHAS, Guest Relations Manager at Napa Valley Hotel & Suites, a 3 Palms Boutique Hotel and Resort, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you for your excellent review, Laci. We are so happy to read that you loved the location, our service, and our rooms. Thank you for mentioning Gary, and noticing our team's efforts, we are very proud of our team who always go above and beyond their line of duty while taking care of our esteemed guests. We are looking forward to your next visit to our hotel. 

Best regards, 
Hotel Management.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Not great.
data.text: The hotel is old, old elevator, very simple. Our blankets were made of synthetic fiber, like shower curtain fabric, terrible. Other than that, the room was ok, clean and organized, very good location. The people at front desk were very friendly and helpful.

owner_response.author: NVHAS, Guest Relations Manager at Napa Valley Hotel & Suites, a 3 Palms Boutique Hotel and Resort, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Hi Sofia, we're glad that your experience with us, from room to staff, was amazing! We'll surely pass along your kind words to the rest of the team. We are pleased to see that you enjoyed our wonderful location. Thank you for your feedback. We will surely look into those items.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Pleasant stay
data.text:
I wasn't expecting a lot. It's your average inn. The room had a strong old carpet smell.  We had to turn up the ad to air out the smell. The wall is very thin and you can hear your neighbors. 

I like that it is located in the heart of downtown Napa. Only a 10 min walk to riverfront.

owner_response.author: NVHAS, Guest Relations Manager at Napa Valley Hotel & Suites, a 3 Palms Boutique Hotel and Resort, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Hi there, while we are glad that you had a decent stay at our hotel, we are disappointed to see that you did not have a great stay with us. We obviously did not check or air your room adequately, and I wish you had informed us of your discomfort at the time, and we would have changed your room for you. We are taking your comments on board, and reviewing our procedures to ensure that your experience is not repeated. Thank you very much for your feedback - it is comments such as yours that help is to improve our service for all of our guests.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Wine tasting
data.text: Room smelled.  Worn holes in sheet.   Stains on towels,  not enough parking.   Manager Gary was rude.   Only hotel bad hotel experience on our trip. Napa is a nice place to visit.    The wine train was fun.  Wine tasting was a good experience.

owner_response.author: NVHAS, Guest Relations Manager at Napa Valley Hotel & Suites, a 3 Palms Boutique Hotel and Resort, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear guest, thank you for sharing your concerns with us. We try very hard to make our guests stays as pleasant as possible and it is always a disappointment when we learn one of them has left with a less than first-rate experience. We wish you had mentioned this to our team, we would have switched your rooms, which should have corrected most of these(specifically cleanliness) issues. Our room service team generally does a great job when it comes to preparing the room for guests, so it is strange that this had happened. We apologize for your inconvenience. Furthermore, we would like to apologize that your experience was spoiled by on of our team member. This is very unlike our team. We normally get great comments about our manager. Please know we will look into your experience further to ensure this does not happen again. I sincerely hope that you might come back on another occasion and stay with us when you are next in the area - I am confident that we will restore your confidence in us, and that you will thoroughly enjoy your stay as vast majority of guests do. Thanks again.

Sincerely,
Hotel Management Team
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Least expensive hotel I could find. Clean, good location.
data.text:
The rooms are adequate and clean, the location is great for walking around Napa. The bathroom was a good size, with a tub, and clean. There are many restaurants, tasting rooms, shops, and even a Kohl's, within a 10 minute walk. The beds are really comfortable. The staff was very friendly and ready to assist. Gary at the front desk provided us with BOGO wine tasting coupons at  nearby tasting rooms, and discount coupons at local restaurants. Gary is very knowledgeable and entertaining! He gave us a map and a tutorial of how to get around the place. 

I didn't give 5 stars because the rooms don't have refrigerators or microwaves, and the parking is limited. We had to leave our car down the street in a public lot a couple of nights. There is no sleeping in. Beginning at 7:00 a.m., people are heading out to the valley to the wineries. Doors are slamming, people are talking, luggage is rolling noisily past the room doors. I sleep with a very loud white noise machine, but the slamming doors were louder.

owner_response.author: NVHAS, Guest Relations Manager at Napa Valley Hotel & Suites, a 3 Palms Boutique Hotel and Resort, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Dear guest, we're really happy to hear that you found us an affordable place to base yourself while visiting an event in Napa valley. I am happy to learn that you enjoyed the value and the amenities of our hotel! It is very rewarding to hear from you on this matter and we appreciate that you have acknowledged our efforts to provide a clean, comfortable, and hospitable experience. We are also pleased to see that Gary was very helpful. We will be sure to pass your compliments to Gary and rest of the team. Thank you for taking the time to share your positive experience here and thank you for your feedback about the room amenities. We will surely look into this. We hope you will stay with us again in your next visit to Napa Valley.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Convenient in the center of Napa
data.text:
The Napa Valley is a convenient motel, located bang in the center of Napa. Everything (incl. great dining options) can be reached on foot.

Staff was friendly, and the room was nicely appointed and of good size. 

All in all, it was a decent stay, but there were a couple of things I did not like: The room smelled so strongly of some disinfectant or cleaning stuff that even open windows didn't help. The pool - while it would be nice for a refreshment - was rather filthy, with lots of things (leafs etc.) swimming in it. And mainly, the coffee maker was not cleaned from the last occupant of the room, since it still had coffee in the jug.

owner_response.author: NVHAS, Guest Relations Manager at Napa Valley Hotel & Suites, a 3 Palms Boutique Hotel and Resort, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear guest, thank you for staying with us and for your review. While we're glad that you liked our hotel and enjoyed its convenient location, we're disappointed to hear about the coffeemaker and pool. This is most unusual, as our service team is very thorough when it comes to preparing the room and keeping the general area very clean. We want to ensure you that this certainly doesn't sound up to our standards, we will be sure to follow up with our service team's attention to ensure this does not happen again. Hopefully, you'll give us another chance to show you the five-star experience we're known for.

Best,
Hotel Management
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Reception Manager a Gem!
data.text:
After traveling extensively for a month in California Gary at Reception was refreshing. 
Not only friendly, he was helpful with information about the area.
The motel was nicely fitted out, clean and tidy, with everything you need for a pleasant short stay.
Nicely situated close to all the restaurants near the river, this is an above average stay. Thanks to Gary.

owner_response.author: NVHAS, Guest Relations Manager at Napa Valley Hotel & Suites, a 3 Palms Boutique Hotel and Resort, responded to this review
owner_response.text: From overall amenities to clean room to staff service it sounds like we were the perfect fit for you, Connie. Thank you so much for your review and your kind words. We'll be sure to pass along your comments to Gary and the rest of the team, and we can't wait to welcome you back again next time you visit Napa.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Hotel in center of Napa
data.text: We enjoyed being in the center of Napa having short walking distances. Light and dryer didn't work when arriving but they were replaced quickly.Rooms were clean. Pool not very attractive. It is a nice place for a short stay.

owner_response.author: NVHAS, Guest Relations Manager at Napa Valley Hotel & Suites, a 3 Palms Boutique Hotel and Resort, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Dear Cornelia, while we are glad we were able to replace the non working amenities right away, we apologize for your convenience. But we are glad you enjoyed our convenient  location. We hope you will come back to stay with us again, we are confident you will have much better experience. Thank you for your review.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: A gem of a find
data.text: Booked rooms at Napa Valley Hotel and Suites based on a prior stay almost ten years ago.  It was good then, even better now. The rooms are clean and well appointed, the pool area is nice, the location to downtown is walkable yet the rooms are quiet, and the remodel since my original stay was very nice. The best part of this hotel is the staff.  They are friendly, go out of their way to help you, and make you feel like their guest. My mother had left her sweater at the hotel, but not in her room. They tracked it down and mailed it to me the next day... I cannot say enough good things about this hotel. I will stay again.

owner_response.author: NVHAS, Guest Relations Manager at Napa Valley Hotel & Suites, a 3 Palms Boutique Hotel and Resort, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Sue, thank you for staying with us. Professional customer service and comfortable rooms with great amenities are always what we strive for and I'm so pleased to hear that we achieved our goal your visit. Thanks for your stellar review, and we can't wait for your next stop in!

Best regards,
Hotel Management
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great place to stay!
data.text: Napa Valley Hotel & Suites was a great place to stay.  My husband and I were celebrating our wedding anniversary.  The manager and staff were wonderful.  The room was updated and clean and the pool area was nice.  The location was perfect - you could easily walk everywhere around downtown Napa.  We would definitely stay here again when we return to Napa!

owner_response.author: NVHAS, Guest Relations Manager at Napa Valley Hotel & Suites, a 3 Palms Boutique Hotel and Resort, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear guest, we are so pleased that you decided to stay with us on your special occasion. We aim to provide quality, comfortable stay with great service so we are really happy to see that we achieved our goal on your visit. Please know that we have shared your kind words to rest of the team and they were pleased to read your compliments. We hope to welcome you back again next time you visit Napa.

Best wishes to both of you,
Hotel Management
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Very well located, at the center to walk in the town
data.text: Excellent customer service, nice and clean rooms, low price.  They recomended to go to the Castle winnery, it was great to go to this place.  It is a small hotel, with parking lot, and a pool.  We walked at night from the hotel to the restaurants and was so close.  The location is very convenient, the price is the lowest price we found it.  I really recomend this hotel.

owner_response.author: NVHAS, Guest Relations Manager at Napa Valley Hotel & Suites, a 3 Palms Boutique Hotel and Resort, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear guest, we're happy your stay with us was pleasant from staff to hotel room. Our great location puts guests right in the area they want to be, and we're glad to hear that you enjoyed that amenity! We're looking forward to your next stay with us.

Best,
Hotel Management
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Location
data.text: The Hotel was in a great location within walking distance to several restaurants.  Room was Clean ne comfortable.  Front desk gave us a few tips on places to eat as well as a couple of coupons.  Parking limited but available on the street and across the street in a parking lot.

owner_response.author: NVHAS, Guest Relations Manager at Napa Valley Hotel & Suites, a 3 Palms Boutique Hotel and Resort, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Dear guest, we're thrilled that you enjoyed your stay with us - our location is hard to beat isn't it!? It's great to hear that you found our staff so friendly, we'll be sure to pass your comments to the team. We hope to welcome you back again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Pleasant stay overall
data.text: The room was very clean and the beds were very comfy. I never "went" to bed, but I just fell asleep on it and woke up the next morning very much refreshed, though the wine I had had that night might have ha d something to do with it. Close in proximity are multiple wine-tasting locations in Napa. The hotel also offers some discount deals at some of these places or other restaurants, which is a nice amenity to go along with nice rooms. Vineyards are also close.

owner_response.author: NVHAS, Guest Relations Manager at Napa Valley Hotel & Suites, a 3 Palms Boutique Hotel and Resort, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Junsoo, we loved reading your review, especially how you described comfort of our beds. Thank you for giving us such a detailed review - we really appreciate it. We're delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us so much, and that everything went smoothly for you - this is the experience that we want all of our guests to have, and indeed the vast majority of them do. We hope that you'll take an opportunity at some stage to visit us again. 

Best,
Hotel Management
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Location adequate accomodation
data.text: Great Location adequate accomodation check in host was great; walk to anywhwre is a big plus.  Napa is a beautiful town we loved it.  We walked to Oxbow Public Market for a delightful meal and strolled along Napa River afterwards - very romantic.

owner_response.author: NVHAS, Guest Relations Manager at Napa Valley Hotel & Suites, a 3 Palms Boutique Hotel and Resort, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
We are so pleased to see that you made the most of our wonderful location. We hope that you will come back to stay with us on your next trip to Napa. Thank you for your review!

best,
Hotel Management
owner_response.title: Owner Response
